author: Pulselight
post_text: February 10, 2020 at 8:36 PM#1HiI want to disable/enable multiple lines in multiple macro’sI know ;Assign macro 1.1601.12 thru 21 /Disable=yes (or no)Now I want to repeat this thru macro 1647So is there a way to ;Assign macro 1.1601.12 thru 21 thru macro 1.1647.12 thru 21 /Disable=yesOr do i have to make 47 lines to create this ?
title: Disabeling multiple macro lines in multiple macro’s
